title: Block International Calls
description: A customer wants to block all outgoing international calls from their phone to prevent accidental charges.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and verify their request.
Access the service feature management tool and apply the 'International Call Block' feature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the blocking feature to the customer's line.

tasks.description: Confirm with the customer that the block has been applied and is effective immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly confirms the action has been completed.
